channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed sees more weakness in U.S. jobs market as it cuts rates by quarter-point
Fed Chair Powell says he will not resign if asked by President-elect Trump
Stocks close at record highs as postelection rally continues after Fed rate cut
Trump gained more women, Hispanic and Black voters in 2024
item.description: Trump benefitted from narrow gains among both men and women, with Harris modestly underperforming compared with Biden in 2020.

item.title: U.S. stocks hit session highs after Powell's press conference wraps up
I went to Harris’s concession speech—here’s what I heard from Black women
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris chose her alma mater Howard University as the site for her speech.

item.title: Powell sends crystal-clear message to Trump: Firing me ‘not permitted under law'
Fed Chair Powell says he would not leave even if Trump asked him to
item.description: Trump has said he should have a say in setting interest rates.

item.title: Fed cuts rates again as inflation falls and Trump victory shifts economic climate
item.description: “We’re on a path to a more neutral stance,” the Fed chair said. “That has not changed at all. We’re just going to have to see where the data is.”

item.title: Trump’s victory reveals secret Republicans: Joe Rogan-obsessed Gen Z men
item.description: Some Gen Zers probably lied about it who they were voting for.
